request.description: Get MTU configuration, including history of MTU transactions and list of suggested countries.
Get MTU configuration, including history of MTU transactions and list of suggested countries.

Execute MTU transaction. While MTU transaction consists of several steps, this endpoint returns result of the very initial step only -
posting transaction authorization request. Actual authorization and fulfillment operations will be executed in asynchronous way
and result will be delivered to the client via Push Notification channel.

and result will be delivered to the client via Push Notification channel.
